instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-02016: What is 820-02016? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  "no image"  chimes and pulls normal power.
threads.message:
Display was damaged and replaced before it was sent to me.    Machine chimes but no image or back light.  No external video.
I tried a new display to make sure.   Did not see any shorts on the display data lines.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02016</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A  "no image"  chimes and pulls normal power.
threads.message:
What the client said?
There was partial image and backlight, before screen replaced?
I suppose damage induced because of wrong manipulation.

Just chimes, no USB activity?
